drupalNodeEvent.title: Where is the UK National Interest in our Economic Relationship with China?

field_speakers.processed: John Edwards (Her Majesty's Trade Commissioner for China)

field_description.processed: The UK’s Integrated Review published earlier this year called for deepening trade and attracting more investment from China. And called China the biggest state-based threat to the UK’s economic security. HM Trade Commissioner to China and Hong Kong, John Edwards, will set out why that is not a contradiction but a reflection of a complex relationship with the world’s second largest economy.
